query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prompt_signs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  prompt_id INT NOT NULL,
  sign_text TEXT NOT NULL,
  failure_pattern VARCHAR(500),
  added_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_prompt_id (prompt_id)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user D8P1hPzTB2gvSDs.1e2fcfb2221e --database 32FJ7HPReivSdgawqQ3aa4 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prompt_signs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  prompt_id INT NOT NULL,
  sign_text TEXT NOT NULL,
  failure_pattern VARCHAR(500),
  added_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_prompt_id (prompt_id)
);
